quizzes.question: Rearrange the code to get the value of the form field and set it as the value of the paragraph with id="demo".
Which method gets the value of an input field?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Summary[/h1]

The following jQuery methods are available to get and set content and attributes of selected HTML elements:
[b]text[/b]() sets or returns the text content of selected elements.
[b]html[/b]() sets or returns the content of selected elements (including HTML markup).
[b]val[/b]() sets or returns the value of form fields.
[b]attr[/b]() sets or returns the value of attributes.
[b]removeAttr[/b]() removes the specified attribute.
